entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
